      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Obtaining a new substance from a neutralisation reaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erreichen einer neuen Substanz von einer 
Neutralisation Reaktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obtention d'une nouvelle substance d'une 
réaction de neutralisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Obtendo uma substância nova de uma reação da 
neutralização</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ottenere una nuova sostanza da una reazione di 
neutralizzazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λήψη μιας νέας ουσίας από μια αντίδραση 
ουδετεροποίησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Obtención de una sustancia nueva de una reacción
de la neutralización</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram demonstrates how to obtain some of the new substance made from a neutralisation reaction between an acid and an alkali.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">common salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutral solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutralisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substance</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie man etwas von der neuen 
Substanz erreicht, die von einer Neutralisation Reaktion zwischen 
einer Säure und einem Alkali gebildet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme démontre comment obtenir une partie
de la nouvelle substance faite à partir d'une réaction de 
neutralisation entre un acide et un alcali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama demonstra como obter alguma da 
substância nova feita de uma reação da neutralização entre um 
ácido e um alcalóide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema dimostra come ottenere alcuna di 
nuova sostanza fatta da una reazione di neutralizzazione fra un acido 
e un alcali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα καταδεικνύει πώς να λάβει μερικές 
από τη νέα ουσία που γίνεται από μια αντίδραση ουδετεροποίησης 
μεταξύ ενός οξέος και ενός αλκαλίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama demuestra cómo obtener algo de la 
sustancia nueva hecha de una reacción de la neutralización entre un 
ácido y un álcali.</string>
          </description>
